isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Service (1994) - INTRODUCTION - LUBRICATION SYSTEM - LOCATION

svcproc.title: LOCATION
svcproc.para: The GEROTOR oil pump is mounted on front cover and is driven by the engine crankshaft at the front of the engine, at engine speed. The right side of the engine has an oil cooler, replaceable full flow oil filter, turbocharger oil line, and crankcase breather tube. The left side of the engine has the oil filler tube, oil level gauge, and oil supply line for the fuel injection pump.
